title: Center the text in averages
description:
Text is current centered at top but should be middle.
High: 4.00 Avg: 4.00 Low: 4.00 # Rpts: 1

title: Grading graph chart by Rank
description: Add a graph that shows the data of the current selected rank in a visually structured way.

title: Correct logout return to rs login page
description: When you log out of the dashboard and try to log back into the RS dashboard it brings you to a blank page without the proper login form.

title: Occasion type info button not populating
description:
Info should show on click or hover.

<button type="button" class="info-icon" onclick="showTooltip(event, 'occasion-setup-tooltip')" title="What does Occasion mean?">ℹ️</button>
